clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Patients Hospitalized in Specialized Cognitive-behavioral Unit (UCC)
clinical_study.official_title: Patient Outcomes After an Hospitalization in the Specialized Cognitive-behavioral Unit (UCC) of Toulon

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre Hospitalier Intercommunal de Toulon La Seyne sur Mer

clinical_study.source: Centre Hospitalier Intercommunal de Toulon La Seyne sur Mer

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to assess the mortality of patient discharged from the specialized cognitive-behavioral unit (UCC) of Toulon.

detailed_description.textblock:
The purpose of specialized cognitive-behavioral unit is to take care of patients demented, valid and with disruptive behavior disorders. The hypothesis is that analyzing the healthcare of these discharged patients might provide a view of the benefices of these units.
The study will be explained to the eligible subjects if they are able to understand it, or to their trusted person, primary caregiver or legal representative.
Medical information will be collected during and after the hospitalization in the specialized cognitive-behavioral unit. The investigator will call the medical staff and the primary caregiver at 3, 6, and 12 months after the patient's discharge, in order to collect study data.

primary_outcome.measure: Mortality rate at 12 month after patient's discharge from UCC
primary_outcome.description: Number of dead patient at 12 month on the total number of patient included

secondary_outcome.measure: Mortality rate at 3 and 6 month after patient's discharge from UCC
secondary_outcome.description: Number of dead patient at 3 and 6 month on the total number of patient included

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess the primary mortality risk factors regarding all the collected data.
secondary_outcome.description: correlation analysis of collected data and survival data will lead to prediction of survival model with the most relevant survival variable

secondary_outcome.measure: Create a predictive score for 6 and 12 month mortality
secondary_outcome.description: all the survival variable will have a score according to the survival prediction model - this endpoint is adressed in order to create a predictive scale/score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mortality rate during the hospitalization in the UCC
secondary_outcome.description: Number of all dead patient on the total number of patient included

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of the number of treatment taken during the study
Analysis of the different classes of treatment taken during the study
secondary_outcome.description: Descriptive analysis of the rate of different classes of treatment taken by patient during the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of the treatment's mode of delivery

study_pop.textblock: The population correspond to all inpatient from the UCC of Toulon

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Inpatient at the UCC of Toulon
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient already included in the study ( a patient cannot be included twice during the study)
- Non-affiliated to a social security regimen
- Objection of the patient, the trusted person, the legal representative, the relative or the member of the family (depending on the overall condition of the patient)
